name: Cylinderman
description:
Cylinderman is a parody of Slenderman. 

In this game you are in a mysterious maze , you must find 5 keys hidden around the maze , but while you search for these keys so that you can escape this strange , dark place , just know that you are not alone . . . 

This is my very first horror games , and my second 3d game ,  so it would be greatly appreciated if you could leave any feedback!
